subject: Basketball (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Kevin Jones scored 24 points and grabbed 14 rebounds to post his 12th double-double of the season as host West Virginia routed Rutgers in an 84-60 Big East victory on Saturday.
snippet: Kevin Jones scored 24 points and grabbed 14 rebounds to post his 12th double-double of the season as host West Virginia routed Rutgers in an 84-60 Big East victory on Saturday.
